statements: SELECT * FROM park_locations ORDER BY park_name ASC;
SELECT park_name, location FROM park_locations WHERE acreage > 1000;
SELECT park_name, established FROM park_locations WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT * FROM park_locations WHERE park_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT AVG(acreage) AS average_acreage, COUNT(*) AS total_parks FROM park_locations;
SELECT park_name, location FROM park_locations WHERE established < '2000-01-01';
SELECT park_name, established FROM park_locations WHERE acreage > 1000 ORDER BY established DESC;
SELECT * FROM park_locations WHERE location LIKE '%national%' ORDER BY park_name ASC;
SELECT park_name, acreage FROM park_locations WHERE acreage BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 AND location LIKE '%forest%' ORDER BY acreage DESC;
SELECT park_name, location, established FROM park_locations WHERE park_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM public_parks;
SELECT park_name, park_location FROM public_parks ORDER BY park_name ASC;
SELECT park_name, visitor_capacity FROM public_parks WHERE visitor_capacity > 5000;
SELECT park_name, established_date FROM public_parks WHERE established_date < '2000-01-01';
SELECT park_name, park_area, visitor_capacity FROM public_parks WHERE park_area > 1000 ORDER BY visitor_capacity DESC;
SELECT park_name, park_location, park_area FROM public_parks ORDER BY park_name ASC;
SELECT park_name, established_date, visitor_capacity FROM public_parks WHERE visitor_capacity > 500 ORDER BY established_date DESC;
SELECT park_name, amenity_name, amenity_description FROM public_parks JOIN park_amenities ON public_parks.park_id = park_amenities.park_id WHERE amenity_name LIKE '%playground%';
SELECT * FROM public_parks WHERE park_area > 1000 AND established_date >= '2010-01-01';

SELECT park_name, park_location, COUNT(amenity_name) AS total_amenities FROM public_parks LEFT JOIN park_amenities ON public_parks.park_id = park_amenities.park_id GROUP BY park_name, park_location ORDER BY total_amenities DESC;
SELECT park_id, park_name, location FROM public_parks;
SELECT park_id, park_name, location FROM public_parks WHERE park_name='Central Park';
SELECT park_name, location FROM public_parks ORDER BY park_name ASC;
SELECT park_id, park_name, location FROM public_parks WHERE park_id=1;
SELECT park_id, park_name, location FROM public_parks WHERE location='New York';
SELECT * FROM public_parks ORDER BY park_name DESC;
SELECT park_name, location FROM public_parks WHERE location='New York';
SELECT park_id, amenity_name, amenity_type FROM park_amenities WHERE amenity_type='Outdoor';
SELECT park_name, visits FROM public_parks JOIN visitor_statistics ON public_parks.park_id = visitor_statistics.park_id;
SELECT visitor_id, visits, visitor_type FROM visitor_statistics WHERE visits > 100 ORDER BY visits DESC;
SELECT * FROM public_parks;
SELECT park_name, location FROM public_parks WHERE established_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT amenity_name, category FROM park_amenities WHERE category = 'Outdoor';
SELECT visitor_count, visit_date FROM visitor_statistics WHERE visitor_count > 1000 ORDER BY visit_date DESC;
SELECT park_name, current_projects FROM public_parks JOIN park_planning ON public_parks.id = park_planning.park_id WHERE future_projects IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM public_parks ORDER BY park_name DESC;
SELECT park_name, location FROM public_parks WHERE established_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY established_date ASC;
SELECT p.park_name, pa.amenity_name FROM public_parks p JOIN park_amenities pa ON p.id = pa.park_id WHERE pa.category = 'Playground';
SELECT park_name, visitor_count, visit_date FROM public_parks p JOIN visitor_statistics vs ON p.id = vs.park_id WHERE visitor_count > 1000 ORDER BY visit_date DESC;

SELECT pp.park_id, pp.current_projects, COUNT(vs.visitor_count) as total_visitors FROM park_planning pp JOIN visitor_statistics vs ON pp.park_id = vs.park_id GROUP BY pp.park_id, pp.current_projects ORDER BY total_visitors DESC;
SELECT * FROM parks
SELECT park_name, location FROM parks
SELECT amenity_name, description FROM amenities
SELECT visitor_count, date_visited FROM visitor_statistics
SELECT activity_name FROM park_activities
SELECT park_name, location, area_acres FROM parks;
SELECT amenity_name, description FROM amenities WHERE park_id = 1;
SELECT park_name, location, visitor_count FROM parks JOIN visitor_statistics ON parks.park_id = visitor_statistics.park_id;
SELECT park_name, activity_name FROM parks JOIN park_activities ON parks.park_id = park_activities.park_id;
SELECT staff_name, role FROM park_staff WHERE park_id = 2;
